articles.content:

We spoke with the LSU superstar just days after he was selected with the 32nd overall pick … [+924 chars]

articles.title: Patriots fullback James Develin retires after neck injury in final season - USA TODAY
articles.description: James Develin, a 2017 Pro Bowl selection, was one of the Patriots' true long-shot stories after rising from practice-squad player to starter.
articles.content:
On Monday, longtime Patriots fullback James Develin announced his retirement from football. A three-time Super Bowl champion, Pro Bowler and Brown alum, Develin retires at 31 due to a neck injury that required surgery last fall.
